Traits/skills benefitical for a psychologist: Effective communication Empathy Enthusiastic about people 2.2.2 Literature No… not ‘Shakesperean’ literature Literature => published academic research Knowledge is constantly updated (that’s why we need research!) findings are usually published in academic journals A good psychologist should update themselves by keeping touch with the literature.
